Position and Size

Resizes, moves, rotates, or slants the selected object.

To access this command...

Choose Format - Object - Graphic - Position and Size

F4 key F4 key


Position and Size

Resizes or moves the selected object.

Rotation

Rotates the selected object.

Slant & Corner Radius

Slants the selected object, or rounds the corners of a rectangular object.

Callout

Specify the properties of the selected callout.

Reset

Resets changes made to the current tab to those applicable when this dialog was opened.
